com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

Interface RestfulContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlRestfulContext

    public interface RestfulContext

    Container for RESTful web service configuration settings.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 05/18/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RestfulContext.MessageType
      Describes the message type to use for web-service PUT/POST requests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getClientBean()
      Retrieves the name of the bean for the configured RestfulSession.
      int getConnectionTimeout()
      Retrieves the configured connection timeout in milliseconds.
      RestfulContext.MessageType getMessageType()
      Retrieves the MessageType for the configured RestfulSession.
      InfinitumContext getParentContext()
      Returns the parent context containing this RestfulConfiguration.
      int getResponseTimeout()
      Retrieves the configured response timeout in milliseconds.
      java.lang.String getRestHost()
      Returns the configured web service host URL.
      boolean isRestAuthenticated()
      Indicates if the web service requires authentication.
      void setClientBean(java.lang.String clientBean)
      Sets the name of the bean for the RestfulSession.
      void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
      Sets the connection timeout.

      Sets the MessageType for the RestfulSession.

      Sets the parent context containing this RestfulConfiguration.

      Sets the response timeout.

      void setRestHost(java.lang.String restHost)
      Sets the web service host URL.

    • Method Detail

      • getParentContext

        InfinitumContext getParentContext()
        Returns the parent context containing this RestfulConfiguration.
        Returns:
        parent InfinitumContext

      • setParentContext

        void setParentContext(InfinitumContext context)
        Sets the parent context containing this RestfulConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        context - parent (@code InfinitumContext}

      • getRestHost

        java.lang.String getRestHost()
        Returns the configured web service host URL.
        Returns:
        web service URL

      • setRestHost

        void setRestHost(java.lang.String restHost)
        Sets the web service host URL.
        Parameters:
        restHost - the host to set

      • setRestAuthenticated

        void setRestAuthenticated(boolean isRestAuthenticated)
        Sets the value indicating if the web service requires authentication.
        Parameters:
        isRestAuthenticated - true if authentication is required, false if not

      • isRestAuthenticated

        boolean isRestAuthenticated()
        Indicates if the web service requires authentication.
        Returns:
        true if authentication is required, false if not

      • getConnectionTimeout

        int getConnectionTimeout()
        Retrieves the configured connection timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout used until a connection is established with the web service.
        Returns:
        connection timeout in milliseconds

      • setConnectionTimeout

        void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Sets the connection timeout. This is the timeout used, in milliseconds, until a connection is established with the web service. The default value is zero.
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - the connection timeout to set

      • getResponseTimeout

        int getResponseTimeout()
        Retrieves the configured response timeout in milliseconds. This is the timeout for waiting for data from the web service. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
        Returns:
        response timeout in milliseconds

      • setResponseTimeout

        void setResponseTimeout(int responseTimeout)
        Sets the response timeout. This is the timeout, in milliseconds, for waiting for data from the web service. A timeout of zero is interpreted as an infinite timeout.
        Parameters:
        responseTimeout - the response timeout in milliseconds

      • getClientBean

        java.lang.String getClientBean()
        Retrieves the name of the bean for the configured RestfulSession.
        Returns:
        the name of the RestfulClient bean or null if it has not been configured

      • setClientBean

        void setClientBean(java.lang.String clientBean)
        Sets the name of the bean for the RestfulSession.
        Parameters:
        clientBean - the name of the RestfulClient bean

      • getMessageType

        RestfulContext.MessageType getMessageType()
        Retrieves the MessageType for the configured RestfulSession.
        Returns:
        MessageType

      • setMessageType

        void setMessageType(RestfulContext.MessageType messageType)
        Sets the MessageType for the RestfulSession.
        Parameters:
        messageType - the MessageType to set
